content:
HL7 is seeking a full time Director of Technical Services/Webmaster who will have primary responsibility over HL7 websites and technical services and infrastructure. Details at http://www.hl7.org/jobs/job.cfm?i=386.

Applicants can be anywhere but the position is based in US timezone.

Note: yes, this does mean that unfortunately @David Johnson is leaving us. We're very sad about that but he's been made an offer too good to refuse. Follow ups on DJ either on #social or to David directly. This is an incredible set of skills, knowledge and passion to have to replace :cry:
